macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: Dow Jones Falls 0.8% on January 28, 2026
items.summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 0.8%, or 408.99 points, closing at 49,003.41, with 18 of its 30 components ending lower. This marked a significant decline amid broader stock market news for the day.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Crypto Market Extends Correction as Major Tokens Decline
items.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum are down 0.80% and 0.62% respectively, with the broader market experiencing continued selling pressure across Layer 1, Layer 2, DeFi, and memecoin sectors. The global cryptocurrency market cap stands at $3.01 trillion, up 1.36% over the last day.

items.title: Bitcoin Stabilizes Around $88,000-$90,000 Amid Market Volatility
items.summary: Bitcoin has traded between $87,704 and $90,600 over the past 24 hours, currently at $88,034 down 1.09%. Ethereum fell to $2,949.36 (-1.51%), while top gainers include SENT (+30%), SYN (+13%), and ARPA (+12%).

items.title: Swiss Bank Sygnum Raises Over 750 Bitcoin for Market-Neutral Fund
items.summary: Crypto bank Sygnum announced its market-neutral Bitcoin fund, the 'Starboard Sygnum,' has successfully raised over 750 bitcoins, reflecting growing institutional interest in digital assets.

items.title: Trump's World Liberty Applies for Federal Bank Charter
items.summary: World Liberty, a Trump-linked cryptocurrency company, applied this month to launch a federally regulated bank in the U.S., which would provide direct oversight of the company's USD1 stablecoin and billions in customer assets. The application has raised questions about potential conflicts of interest.

items.title: Ethereum Network Activity Grows Amid New ETF Launches
items.summary: Ethereum transaction volumes and DeFi protocol value locked remain elevated. New exchange-traded funds targeting altcoin baskets and ETH tokens have entered the market, enhancing capital flow into the ecosystem.

items.title: XRP Strengthens Amid Regulatory Clarity and Adoption Growth
items.summary: Ripple's XRP token has gained in price, holding around $2.10, as investors positively assess the token's resilience following regulatory uncertainty resolution and increasing adoption of Ripple's cross-border payment solutions by major financial companies.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Mark Zuckerberg Teases Major AI Rollout for 2026
items.summary: Mark Zuckerberg announced 2026 as a pivotal year for 'personal super intelligence' with agentic commerce tools and advanced AI agents for software development and everyday applications. This builds on trends in autonomous AI systems for e-commerce and content creation.

items.title: Microsoft Reports $7.6 Billion Gain from OpenAI Investment
items.summary: Microsoft's earnings show a $7.6 billion windfall from its OpenAI stake, underscoring AI's role in powering cloud services, enterprise software, and innovations across healthcare and finance.

items.title: NVIDIA Urges Renewal of National Quantum Initiative for AI Integration
items.summary: NVIDIA pushes for reauthorization of the U.S. National Quantum Initiative, emphasizing the need to integrate quantum computing with AI for scientific supercomputers, error correction, and research productivity.

items.title: AI in Energy Market Projected to Reach $18.31 Billion by 2030
items.summary: The AI market in energy and power is expected to grow from $6.45 billion in 2025 to $18.31 billion by 2030 at a 23.2% CAGR, driven by predictive maintenance, smart meters, and renewable energy integration.

items.title: Haber Wins Frost & Sullivan Award for Industrial AI Innovation
items.summary: Haber received Frost & Sullivan's 2025 Global Technology Innovation Leadership Recognition for its AI-driven process control, integrating machine learning with physics-based models for manufacturing efficiency and sustainability.

items.title: WEF Davos Report Highlights 32 Real-World AI Case Studies
items.summary: The World Economic Forum released 32 AI use cases at scale across industries, including AMD's reinforcement learning doubling chip design productivity, AI reducing energy use by 95% in China, and accelerating drug discovery.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: World of Warcraft Midnight Pre-Expansion Update Released
items.summary: The WoW Midnight pre-expansion update features a complete transmog overhaul based on equipment slots for consistent appearances during gear upgrades, alongside other class reworks and housing features. It launched as part of events within the past 24 hours.

items.title: Monopoly Go Golden Blitz Event for Harry Potter Album Underway
items.summary: Monopoly Go's Golden Blitz event started at 12:00 PM EST on January 28, 2026, lasting 24 hours to help players complete the ending Harry Potter GO sticker album with selected gold stickers. This is potentially the final event for the album.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield Launch Rewards and Headhunting Schedule Active
items.summary: Arknights: Endfield features ongoing launch reward codes valid until January 29th, a Chartered Headhunting Schedule through March with banners like 'Scars of the Forge' (Laevatain), and events like Voyage to the Stars until March 4th. Community discussions highlight meta teams and future character leaks.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
